item.title: CVE-2024-49622|2024-10-20T09:03:39.205Z -- apa -- apa%20banner%20slider
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Apa Apa Banner Slider allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Apa Banner Slider: from n/a through 1.0.0.
